name: YCOM
description:
YCOM parodies the traditional XCOM gameplay, with more focus on fun and speed. You command elite task force tasked with eliminating the enemy team(s) using snowballs and the environment.
Gameplay is centered around sneaking and surprising the enemies. Environment also plays big role. Coating your snowballs in water turns them to iceballs, each with different properties.

This game is being developed by one developer.

features:

  • 4 classes with unique properties and abilities
  • multiplayer
  • set of diverse maps

Inspired by XCOM series and Into The Breach.
